content: Confluence seems up, but Jira says "Down for maintenance" and I don't recall a planned outage notification
@Eric Schmitt @Joshua Procious
Looking into now. We have seen this the last 3 nights - caused by AWS restarting the instance for security patches we believe.
shouldn't the instance start all it's services?
We believe the JIRA ec2... which is seperate from Confluence and Crowd... is installing updates...
We (Hl7/AMG) are not the ROOT user for aws. We think they have a policy to update the EC2s regardless if we set a time-window we prefer for the updates.
Yes Jira was down for 1 Hour. It is back up now.
